statements: SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT total_budget, organizer_name FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE organizer_name = 'ABC Advocacy Group' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31' AND total_budget >= 5000 ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, organizer_name, advocacy_goal FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE advocacy_goal LIKE '%environment%' ORDER BY organizer_name, campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget, advocacy_goal FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE total_funds > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_email FROM campaign_participants WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_funds FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM campaign_participants ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE total_funds > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_funds FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, participant_name FROM advocacy_campaigns JOIN campaign_participants ON advocacy_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_participants.campaign_id WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT AVG(total_funds) AS avg_funds, MAX(total_funds) AS max_funds FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM past_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM past_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participation_date FROM campaign_participants WHERE participation_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM past_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, participant_name, participation_date FROM past_campaigns JOIN campaign_participants ON past_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_participants.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM past_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON past_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE metric_value > 100;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS participants_count FROM past_campaigns JOIN campaign_participants ON past_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_participants.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY participants_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT performance_metric, metric_value FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM campaign_participants LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM campaign_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_donations FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, performance_metric, metric_value FROM advocacy_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON advocacy_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id WHERE metric_value >= 50;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM campaign_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_title, budget, start_date FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM campaign_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_title, metric_name, metric_value FROM advocacy_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON advocacy_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id;
SELECT participant_name, role, contact_email FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_title, start_date, budget FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, participant_name, role, contact_email FROM campaign_participants WHERE role = 'Volunteer';
SELECT campaign_id, action_type, action_date, action_description FROM campaign_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT result_type, result_value, result_date FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
